View Javadoc
1   package com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.cache;
2   
3   import org.junit.Test;
4   
5   import java.nio.file.Paths;
6   
7   import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
8   import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.containsString;
9   
10  /**
11   * Unit tests for {@linkplain FileIndexResourceFactory}
12   */
13  public class FileIndexResourceFactoryTest {
14  
15      @Test
16      public void testGenerateUniqueCacheFile()
17      {
18          FileIndexResourceFactory factory = new FileIndexResourceFactory(Paths.get("/tmp"));
19          assertThat(factory.generateUniqueCachePath("dummy://www.test.com/somefile.bin").toString(),
20                  containsString("www.test.com_"));
21          assertThat(factory.generateUniqueCachePath("test://www.test.com:8080/somefile.bin").toString(),
22                  containsString("www.test.com_"));
23          assertThat(factory.generateUniqueCachePath("foo://billg@www.test.com:8080/somefile.bin").toString(),
24                  containsString("www.test.com_"));
25          assertThat(factory.generateUniqueCachePath("bar://billg:hunter2@www.test.com:8080/somefile.bin").toString(),
26                  containsString("www.test.com_"));
27      }
28  }
